text: Cady Groves (July 30, 1989 â€“ May 2, 2020) was an American singer-songwriter. She was born in Marlow, Oklahoma. Her best known songs were "This Little Girl", "Oh Darlin'", "Forget You", and "Love Actually". She released four EPs: A Month of Sundays (2009), This Little Girl (2010), Life of a Pirate (2012), and Dreams (2015). Groves died of natural causes in Nashville, Tennessee on May 2, 2020 at the age of 30. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American pop singers Category:American country singers Category:American rock singers Category:Singers from Oklahoma Category:Writers from Oklahoma
title: Cady Groves
